content: नह् {c4c} <ab>U.</ab> (नह्यति-ते, नद्ध; {%<ab>desid.</ab>%} निनत्सति-ते) {@--1@} To tie, bind, bind on or round or together, gird round; शैलेयनद्धानि शिलातलानि <ls>Ku. 1. 56</ls>; <ls>R. 4. 57</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 41.</ls> {@--2@} To put on (oneself), to dress, arm oneself (<ab>Atm.</ab>). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to put on. --WITH अप to untie. --अपि (अपि being often changed to पि) {@--1@} to fasten, gird round, bind; अतिपिनद्धेन वल्कलेन <ls>Ś. 1</ls>; मंदारमाला हरिणा पिनद्धा <ls>Ś. 7. 2.</ls> {@--2@} to put on, wear; <ls>Bk. 3. 47.</ls> {@--3@} to cover, envelop; क्रुसुममिव पिनद्धं पांडुपत्रोदरेण <ls>Ś. 1. 19.</ls>
